post.text: A young girl asked Hillary, "Do you think when you're president, you'll be paid as much as a man?"

comment.author: Cole
comment.text: I have loved hillary more than I loved obama just pray for her to become president God bless u hillary all the way to the white house

replies.author: Ayla
replies.text: Too many praying for her to go to prison for corruption.
